casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Green, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Green (1996), 74 Ohio St.3d 275.]

(No. 95-1451 Submitted November 7, 1995 Decided January 10, 1996.) Mathias H. Heck, Montgomery County Prosecuting Attorney, and Carley J. Ingram, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Grady G. Green II, pro se. *276 Per Curiam.

We affirm the decision of the court of appeals for the reasons stated in its opinion.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
